page.title: 09Rayleigh Church/Stevens Farm
page.content: Our group went to{Rayleigh church}the Rev. P. Taylor is the Rector. It costs the Parish Â£33,000 a year to maintain the church. The church's income from Parish in a year is Â£32,000. A service can be anything from a quarter of an hour up to an hour long. 2 or 3 people may come to a service and at other times up to 300 people come depending on the type of service. Mr Taylor conducted 85{funerals,}35{weddings}and 15{christenings}last year. Stevens Farm We went to{Stevens Farm.}Mr. Smith is the farmer he has a{mixed farm}growing rape seed,potatoes and wheat.In the old days at harvest time there were a 100 people who worked the land,today there are between 5 to 10 people. He owns 445 acres in Rayleigh.He has 2,000 chickens they lay 3 eggs in 2 days.He takes his wheat to Rochford
